about_the_game:
Welcome to a charming retro-style 3D platformer inspired by classic PS1 collect-a-thons. In this game, you play as Mars, a brave tiger on a quest to restore the lost memories of Princess Mia by exploring her dream world.



The game offers colorful and delightful dreamscapes filled with endearing characters. Mars can run, jump, and dash through levels, unlocking new areas as you progress.

The game's low-poly models and retro video effects create a nostalgic atmosphere, transporting players back to a simpler time. Additionally, the game features an original, hand-crafted soundtrack that further enhances the immersive experience.

Overall, this game offers a fun and engaging gameplay experience for fans of classic platformers. Join Mars on his journey to restore Princess Mia's lost memories and explore a charming dream world filled with vibrant characters.

name: Save My Dreams

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: x64
  • Memory: 300 MB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
